title: Extensive HPLC-tandem mass spectrometry characterization of soluble degradation products of biodegradable nanoplastics under environmentally relevant temperature and irradiation conditions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00960B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thierry Douki, Vérane Bard, Maëva Boulée, Marie Carrière
The low molecular weight degradation products of nanosize biodegradable plastics were identified by mass spectrometry. The only detected products for PLA, PCL and PET were found to a rise from hydrolysis.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
